item.title: ‘Pirates of the Caribbean’ Producer Spoke to Johnny Depp About Jack Sparrow’s Return in ‘Pirates 6’: ‘If He Likes the Way the Part’s Written, I Think He Would Do It’
item.description: Johnny Depp is possibly eyeing a return as Jack Sparrow in a sixth “Pirates of the Caribbean” movie, at least according to franchise producer Jerry Bruckheimer. In a new interview with Ent
